.elementor-kit-32{--e-global-color-primary:#6EC1E4;--e-global-color-secondary:#54595F;--e-global-color-text:#7A7A7A;--e-global-color-accent:#61CE70;--e-global-typography-primary-font-family:"Roboto";--e-global-typography-primary-font-weight:600;--e-global-typography-secondary-font-family:"Roboto Slab";--e-global-typography-secondary-font-weight:400;--e-global-typography-text-font-family:"Roboto";--e-global-typography-text-font-weight:400;--e-global-typography-accent-font-family:"Roboto";--e-global-typography-accent-font-weight:500;}.elementor-section.elementor-section-boxed > .elementor-container{max-width:1140px;}.elementor-widget:not(:last-child){margin-bottom:20px;}h1.entry-title{display:var(--page-title-display);}@media(max-width:1024px){.elementor-section.elementor-section-boxed > .elementor-container{max-width:1024px;}}@media(max-width:767px){.elementor-section.elementor-section-boxed > .elementor-container{max-width:767px;}}

}

     text-decoration: none;

}

    margin: 0.65rem 0;
    padding: 0.65rem 0;
    font-weight: 600;
}

    padding: 2.5rem;
    margin: 0rem!important; 
    background-color: #f9f9f9;
    letter-spacing: 0!important;
}

  .elementor-element .elementor-widget-container .head h1,
  .elementor-element .elementor-widget-container .head h4{
  padding: 0!important;
  margin: 0!important;
  color: #fff!important;

}

  font-size: 2rem;
}

    color: red!important;
    text-align: center!important;
    margin-top: -34%!important;
  }
  .elementor-element .elementor-widget-container .head h2,
  .elementor-element .elementor-widget-container .head h1{
      font-weight: 500!important;

      font-size: 1rem!important;

      font-size: 1.1rem!important;
  }

      font-size: 1rem!important;
  }

  color: #fff!important;

/********** INNER DETAILS TEAM CONTENT***********/
  /** Wayne Beaubien **/
  /*** Fred Bean ***/
  /** Anita Beaubien **/
  .elementor-element .elementor-widget-container .team *,
  .elementor-element .elementor-widget-container .team2 *,
  .elementor-element .elementor-widget-container .team3 *,
  .elementor-element .elementor-widget-container .team4 *,
  .elementor-element .elementor-widget-container .team5 * {
    padding: 0;
    margin: 0;
    -webkit-box-sizing: border-box;
            box-sizing: border-box;
    
  }
  
  .elementor-element .elementor-widget-container .team,
  .elementor-element .elementor-widget-container .team2,
  .elementor-element .elementor-widget-container .team3,
  .elementor-element .elementor-widget-container .team4,
  .elementor-element .elementor-widget-container .team5{ 
    position: fixed;
    z-index: 999;
    top: 0!important;
    border: 1px solid #d5d5d5;
    font-family: Raleway;
    display: none;
    z-index: 999!important;
    position: fixed;
    left: 0;
    top: 0;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    background-color: #fefefe!important;
    background-color: black;
    background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4);
    -webkit-animation-name: fadeIn;
    -webkit-animation-duration: 0.4s;
    animation-name: fadeIn;
    animation-duration: 0.5s;
    padding: 5rem!important;
    overflow: auto;
  }

  .elementor-element .elementor-widget-container .team .container-wrapper,
  .elementor-element .elementor-widget-container .team2 .container-wrapper2,
  .elementor-element .elementor-widget-container .team3 .container-wrapper3,
  .elementor-element .elementor-widget-container .team4 .container-wrapper4,
  .elementor-element .elementor-widget-container .team5 .container-wrapper5 {
    border: 1px solid #d5d5d5;
    box-shadow: 5px 5px 5px;
    border-radius: 5px;
 }
  
  .elementor-element .elementor-widget-container .wrapper,
  .elementor-element .elementor-widget-container .wrapper2 ,
  .elementor-element .elementor-widget-container .wrapper3 ,
  .elementor-element .elementor-widget-container .wrapper4 ,
  .elementor-element .elementor-widget-container .wrapper5 {
    display: -webkit-box;
    display: -ms-flexbox;
    display: flex;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
  }

  .elementor-element .elementor-widget-container .img-wrapper2 figure ,

    border-radius: 5px!important;
  }

  }

    font-weight: bold;
  }

  .elementor-element .elementor-widget-container .close:focus {
    color: #000;
    text-decoration: none;
    cursor: pointer;
  }

  } }

  @-webkit-keyframes slideIn {
   from {
     top: -300px;
     opacity: 0;
   }
   to {
     top: 0;
     opacity: 1;
   }
 }
 
 @keyframes slideIn {
   from {
     top: -300px;
     opacity: 0;
   }
   to {
     top: 0;
     opacity: 1;
   }
 }
 
 @-webkit-keyframes fadeIn {
   from {
     opacity: 0;
   }
   to {
     opacity: 1;
   }
 }
 
 @keyframes fadeIn {
   from {
     opacity: 0;
   }
   to {
     opacity: 1;
   }
 } 


 /**** BUTTON OVERLAY ***/

.elementor-element .elementor-widget-container .container {
  position: relative;
}
.elementor-element .elementor-widget-container .team-details .image ,
.elementor-element .elementor-widget-container .image {
  display: block;
  width: 100%;
  height: auto;
}
.elementor-element .elementor-widget-container .team-details .overlay2 ,
.elementor-element .elementor-widget-container .overlay2 {
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  height: 100%;
  width: 100%;
  opacity: 0;
  -webkit-transition: .5s ease;
  transition: .5s ease;
  background-color: #111111;
}


.elementor-element .elementor-widget-container .team-details:hover .overlay2,
.elementor-element .elementor-widget-container .container:hover .overlay2 {
  opacity: 1;
}
.elementor-element .elementor-widget-container .team-details .text,
.elementor-element .elementor-widget-container .text {
  color: white;
  font-size: 20px;
  position: absolute;
  top: 50%;
  left: 50%;
  -webkit-transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
  transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
  text-align: center;
}

.elementor-element .elementor-widget-container button{
  background-color: transparent!important;
}
.elementor-element .elementor-widget-container .container:hover .overlay2 button#myBtn,
.elementor-element .elementor-widget-container .container:hover .overlay2 button#myBtn2,
.elementor-element .elementor-widget-container .container:hover .overlay2 button#myBtn3,
.elementor-element .elementor-widget-container .container:hover .overlay2 button#myBtn4,
.elementor-element .elementor-widget-container .container:hover .overlay2 button#myBtn5 {
  background-color: transparent!important;
}

.elementor-element .elementor-widget-container .container:hover .overlay2 button#myBtn:hover,
.elementor-element .elementor-widget-container .container:hover .overlay2 button#myBtn2:hover,
.elementor-element .elementor-widget-container .container:hover .overlay2 button#myBtn3:hover,
.elementor-element .elementor-widget-container .container:hover .overlay2 button#myBtn4:hover,
.elementor-element .elementor-widget-container .container:hover .overlay2 button#myBtn5:hover {
  background-color: transparent!important;
}

.elementor-element .elementor-widget-container .main-container-wrapper{
  border-bottom: 3px solid #008ccb;
}

.elementor-element .elementor-widget-container .main-container-wrapper:hover{
  border-bottom: 3px solid #000;
}

.elementor-element .elementor-widget-container .main-container-wrapper .videoH,
.elementor-element .elementor-widget-container .main-container-wrapper .videoH2{
  margin-top: 2.5rem!important;
}
